WRITING.TEXT: D'Ambrosio drives for a US team and there aren't any US drivers
He's Belgian but drives for a US team - so the app prioritises Buemi who is Swiss and drives for a French team - I may play with the algorithm now.

WRITING.TITLE: I made this web app to find your nearest teams and drivers to support

WRITING.TEXT: Hi, I created the website myself using 'Brackets Sprint' - it's a coding text editor. There are a lot of pre-built templates out there though - if you do a quick google you will be able to find a good one.
Thanks for your feedback - I will definitely make the period change.
This is very cool - particularly the 'friend network' towards the bottom of the page once you sign in with facebook
